articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Industrial Establishments in Kanggye
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Industrial Establishments in Kanggye
 Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to industrial establishments in Kanggye City. 
					 The first leg of his guidance was the Jangjagang Machine Tool Factory.
					
					 After being briefed on the modernization of the factory, he went round various shops of the factory and new products to learn in detail about the technical updating and production there.
					
					 He repeatedly praised the officials, workers and technicians of the factory for having done a lot of work in a matter of one year, noting that the appearance of the factory has radically changed and all the production processes have been successfully placed on a modern and scientific basis and a high level of cultured practices ensured in production and life in a short span of time. 
					
					 The party members and other working people of the factory have overfulfilled their production quotas on indices by effectively carrying out the technological updating by their own efforts and with their own technology to suit its actual conditions, he said, adding that the scientific and technological progress made by the factory is a striking proof of the validity and vitality of the WPK's idea of attaching importance to science.
					
					 He stressed that it is possible to attain any difficult scientific and technological goal at one go when one makes persevering efforts, giving priority to the scientific and technological development just as the workers of the factory did. 
					
					 He set forth important tasks to be fulfilled by the factory.
					
					 He underscored the need to steadily wage a drive for putting the factory on a modern and scientific basis as required by the IT age and, at the same time, pay primary attention to introducing the latest science and technology, rapidly raise the level of technical skills of the producers and strictly abide by the technical rules and the standard regulations of operation.
					
					 The next leg of his guidance was the Kanggye Knitting Mill.
					
					 After going round the room devoted to the history of the mill, he visited the general shop, the dyeing shop, a dining room and a non-staple food store and other places to acquaint himself in detail with the production and supply service at the mill.
					
					 Watching varieties of knit goods of diverse beautiful colors being churned out, he said that the mill is not a big one having small manpower, but it has contributed to improving the standard of people's living by widely introducing new technology and profitably managing itself. He appreciated the assiduous way it has managed its economic life.
					
					 He stressed the need to steadily boost the production as solving the issue of clothing is as important as settling the food problem. He proposed the tasks to be carried out by the mill. 
					
					 Only when the party policy on producing knitwear is thoroughly implemented in the field of light industry, is it possible to boost the production of textiles and garment with less materials and make the people's dressing diverse, he noted, underlining the need for the mill to increase the production of varieties of quality knitwear to the likings of people to help improve the standard of people's living. 
					
					 After being told that Manager Kang Song Hwa and other officials of the mill received orphans who graduated from their school and took deep care of them, helping them emerge proud labor innovators, he said they are, indeed, possessors of good personalities with a noble view on life and morality and sense of obligation. 
					
					 The last leg of his guidance was the Kanggye Wine Factory.
					
					 He went round the newly-built beer shop, storing room and various other places of the factory to learn in detail about the equipment and production there.
					
					 He was greatly satisfied to learn that the factory has not only steadily boosted the production by updating the production processes and increasing its capacity but successfully set up new production processes including those for the production of beer and raw rice wine.
					
					 The factory has steadily lifted the production and strictly abided by the principle of profitability in its management by waging a widespread mass technical innovation movement and establishing a production system relying on its locally available raw materials, he said, adding that the experience gained by the factory goes to prove that the introduction of science and technology precisely means production and vice versa.
					
					 He put forward important tasks to be carried out by the factory.
					
					 He underscored the need for the factory to continue dynamically pushing ahead with the modernization and scientification of the production processes and effectively conduct the work for helping the officials, workers and technicians acquire the latest science and technology in order to steadily increase the production. 
					
					 Noting that it is necessary to provide the factory with sufficient quantities of raw and other materials in order to keep it going at a high rate, he pointed out that to this end it is essential to improve grape seeds and the manuring and tending of them to boost the production of quality grapes. 
					
					 He said it is important for the factory to preserve the taste of its special product wine peculiar to it as it has a long history.
					
					 Underlining the need to realize specializing in production in order to improve the quality of the product, he called for independently developing beer, raw rice wine and other production processes as its branches.
					
					 The people of Jagang Province turned its cities and villages into fairylands by their own efforts in the hard days of "the Arduous March", the forced march and are now dashing ahead in sky-high spirit as frontrankers in the drive for building a great prosperous and powerful nation, he noted, extending a warm salute to all the officials, party members and other working people of the province. 
					
					  Noting that Jagang Province is witnessing miracles and feats marveling the world people day by day, he said that this stirring reality is a brilliant fruition of the great Kanggye spirit and revelation of the inexhaustible mental power of the Korean people who inherited the spirit of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 He expressed expectation and conviction that the working people of the province including those in Kanggye City would continue creditably playing a vanguard role in the gigantic drive for building a thriving nation.
					
					 He was accompanied by Pak To Chun, chief secretary of the Jagang Provincial Committee of the WPK, Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the C.C., the WPK, and Kim Kyong Hui, Pak Nam Gi and Jang Song Thaek, department directors of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: US Envoy Bosworth Leaves
articles.content:
US Envoy Bosworth Leaves
 Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Stephen Bosworth, U.S. special representative for DPRK policy, and his party left here by air on Thursday.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Burkina Faso President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Burkina Faso President
 Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Blaise Compaore, president of Burkina Faso, on Wednesday on the occasion of its 51st national day.
					 Heartily wishing the Burkinese president greater success in his work for the development of the country and peace and security in the sub-region of West Africa, Kim in the message expressed belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Burkina Faso would grow stronger.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Bolivian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Bolivian President
 Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Evo Morales Aima on his reelection as president of the Plurinational State of Bolivia.
					 Expressing belief that the relations between the DPRK and Bolivia would develop favorably in the interests and desire of their peoples, Kim in the message heartily wished the president success in his responsible work for the independent development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Meets DR Congo Gov. Delegation
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Meets DR Congo Gov. Delegation
 Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun met and had a talk with the government delegation of Democratic Congo headed by Ignace Gata Mavita, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, who paid a courtesy call on him Thursday.

articles.title: US-DPRK Science Engagement Consortium Delegation Here
articles.content:
US-DPRK Science Engagement Consortium Delegation Here
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the U.S.-DPRK science engagement consortium led by Peter Agre, president of the American Association for the Advancement of Science, arrived here by air on Thursday.

articles.title: Senior State Officials Enjoy Art Performance
articles.content:
Senior State Officials Enjoy Art Performance
 Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by the art squad of the Ministry of People's Security at the People's Palace of Culture Thursday.
					 It was appreciated by senior state officials, the chairman and chairperson of friendly parties, officials of ministries and national institutions and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as mixed chorus "We Longed to See the General", Oungum ensemble "The General Star Beyond the Clouds", trumpet and female solo "Soldiers Live Near the General", choral recitation "Long Journey for Devotedly Defending the Leader" and small chorus "May the Era of the Workers' Party of Korea Prosper."
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the Songun revolutionary leadership exploits General Secretary Kim Jong Il has performed by making a breakthrough towards victory in the drive for bringing about a new great revolutionary surge through his unprecedented forced march and truthfully represented the shining feats registered by the interior forces in the struggle for defending the outpost of the class struggle and the security of the socialist country and its people.

articles.title: DPRK Weightlifters Win Gold at East Asian Games
articles.content:
DPRK Weightlifters Win Gold at East Asian Games
 Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- DPRK weightlifters Kim Kum Sok and Jong Chun Mi bagged gold medals in the men's 69 kg category contest and the women's 58 kg category contest respectively at the Fifth East Asian Games held on December 8.
					 Kim Kum Sok lifted 180 kg in jerk and 141 kg in snatch, thus coming first with a total of 321 kg while Jong Chun Mi lifted 132 kg in jerk and 100 kg in snatch, placing first with a total of 232 kg.

articles.title: Red-and-blue Paintings Preserved
articles.content:
Red-and-blue Paintings Preserved
 Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Efforts for preserving red-and-blue paintings, a valuable heritage of the Korean nation, in their origin have been made in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Red-and-blue painting is a kind of decorative art used in construction of wooden buildings in Korea from olden times.
					
					 Under the direction of the government, all the colorful paintings across the country have been preserved or restored to their original state with Popun Temple in Mt. Ryongak as a model.
					
					 The colorful painting of Kwangje Temple in Pukchong, Simwon Temple in Yonthan, Yongpha Pavilion in Huichon and other historic relics has already been completed in conformity with the principle of fidelity to historical truth and scientific requirements to be followed by other relics throughout the country.
					
					 Meanwhile, such scientific activities as short course and symposium have been held on the subject of preserving paintings well for many years.
					
					 They have been participated in by specialists from the Cultural Relics Conservation Guidance Bureau, the Academy of Social Sciences, Pyongyang University of Construction and Building-Materials Industry, Koryo Fine Arts Studio and leading institutes of national architecture.
					
					 The Korean Cultural Preservation Agency has summarized materials concerning the newly-found original state of several hundred pieces of old colorful painting patterns and, based on it, had on-the-spot discussions on trial colorful paintings with researchers concerned.

articles.title: Lives Devoted to Prosperity of Motherland
articles.content:
Lives Devoted to Prosperity of Motherland
 Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- In the Democratic People's Republic of Korea there are many people devoting their clear conscience and even lives to the prosperity of the country.
					 Ri Yong, a heading workteam leader of the Pongchang Area Coal Mine, devoted his life to the coal production.
					
					 Working at the mine for nearly three decades as a heading worker and a heading workteam leader, he, together with his men, had procured thousands of tools and accessories needed to overfulfil the workteam's heading plan every year.
					
					 He had dedicated his all to coal output, encouraging his men to do their part as coal miners to increase the production. That is why he, though dead, is still remembered by people. 
					
					 Among such patriotic coal miners as Ri Yong are Jo Nam Sik and Kang Kye Jin of the Kangso Coal Mine.
					
					 Jo rescued fellow colliers when a pit was collapsing in last June, while Kang was an official of the mine with a 30-odd years long career of pitman.
					
					 Ri Jin Guk, a worker of the Sunchon Plastic Daily Necessities Factory, kept his machine going until the last moment of his life, giving a pattern of life devoted to the country.
					
					 Sonu Pong Nam, a hewer of the Ryongnam Coal Mine, Sin Kum Nam, a farmer of the Ryongok Co-op Farm in Yomju County, Kim Ho Sok, a worker of the Kosan Essential Foodstuff Factory and Ri Jang Gun, a member of the Revolutionary Battle Site Management Office at the secret camp of Mt. Paektu are also known as patriots who lived for the prosperity of the socialist motherland.
					
					 Their true life and working manner recorded in the history of the building of a great, prosperous and powerful nation inspire the Korean people to work miracles in the efforts to bring about a new revolutionary upsurge.

articles.title: S. Korea-US Combined Air Assault Exercise under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korea-US Combined Air Assault Exercise under Fire
 Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- South Korean MBC reported that the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet armed forces would kick off a "combined air assault exercise" in the areas of Ryoju, Kyonggi Province, and Hongchon, south Korean Kangwon Province on December 8.
					 It added that the two day-long military exercise would involve a squadron of assault planes and other squadron of combat planes belonging to the seventh mobile army corps of the puppet army and Apaches and other helicopters belonging to the second combat air brigade of the U.S. forces in south Korea.
					
					 The warmongers asserted that the exercise was aimed at boosting the capability for carrying out the combined operations and setting the norm for maximizing the capability for joint operations between the units for ground operations and units for providing air support.
					
					 The joint saber rattling being staged by the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet warmongers in the sky, ground and seas of south Korea non-stop is further increasing the danger of a war on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: WIDF Supports Cause of Korean People
articles.content:
WIDF Supports Cause of Korean People
 Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- A solidarity statement supporting the women and other people of the DPRK in the struggle for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country was adopted at the meeting of the Executive Committee of the Women's International Democratic Federation (WIDF) held in Brazil from Dec. 2 to 4.
					 Noting that the U.S. and south Korean bellicose forces are vociferating about the fictitious "military threat" from the DPRK while viciously maneuvering to provoke a war of aggression against the DPRK under the pretext of it, the statement said:
					
					 Paying due attention to the acute situation of the Korean Peninsula, the WIDF fully supports the struggle of the Korean people including women to defend the sovereignty of the country and ensure peace and security of the peninsula under the banner of Songun.
					
					 The WIDF strongly demands that the U.S. immediately withdraw its troops from south Korea and drop its unjust hostile policy towards the DPRK at once.
					
					 It fully supports and extends firm solidarity to the Korean people including women in the struggle to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country under the banner of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration, the milestone of Korea's reunification.

articles.title: European Figure Praises Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
European Figure Praises Kim Jong Suk
 Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Edmond Jouve, director-general of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, issued a statement on December 4 on the occasion of the 92nd birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese heroine.
					 Dec. 24 is a significant day when she was born, the statement said, and went on:
					
					After taking part in the anti-Japanese armed struggle for the liberation of Korea in her early years
						 Kim Jong Suk regarded it as her most sacred mission to protect President Kim Il Sung, the sun of the nation.
					
					 Many anti-Japanese battle zones bear witness to the historic exploits she performed by protecting the President at the risk of her life.
					
					 She was a prominent political figure.
					
					Thanks to her energetic activities the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland, the organization of the anti-Japanese national united front founded by the President, expanded its organizational network into different parts of the country and people from all walks of life including not only workers, peasants, youth and students but also religionists and national capitalists turned out as one in the sacred struggle for national liberation.
					
					 Even after the liberation of Korea she reliably helped the President in his work.
					
					 She performed an outstanding feat by making sure that the cause of the President was successfully carried forward generation after generation.
					
					 Six decades have passed since her demise but she is always remembered by the Korean people and the world progressives.

articles.title: DPRK Important Days Observed
articles.content:
DPRK Important Days Observed
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held in Peru and Sweden and a seminar in France between December 1 and 5 on the occasions of the 18th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 92nd birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese heroine.
					On display at the venues of the events were photos on the Songun revolutionary leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il and Korean books.
					
					Attending those events were personages of the Peruvian Preparatory Committee to Commemorate the Centenary of Birth of President Kim Il Sung, the Peruvian Association for the Study of Revolutionary Activities of Comrade Kim Jong Suk, the New Left Movement of Peru, the Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association and the French Group for the Study of the Juche and Songun Idea and popular masses.
					
					Speakers at the meeting held in Peru said that December 24 is a very significant day to socialist Korea as Kim Jong Suk, the great model of the world progressives, was born in 1917 and 
						Kim Jong Il assumed the KPA supreme commandership in 1991 and visited the Chollima Steel Complex in 2008 to kindle the torch of new great revolutionary surge.
					
					They highly praised Kim Jong Suk, saying her noblest exploits are that she defended the headquarters of the Korean revolution at the cost of her life and gave birth to and brought up Kim Jong Il as the heir to the Juche revolutionary cause, thus providing sure guarantee for carrying forward the socialist cause generation after generation.
					
					 They stressed that Kim Jong Il has wisely led the Korean people in the drive to open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 Christer Lundgren, chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, in his speech noted that Kim Jong Il has trained the KPA to be an invincible army so as to provide sure guarantee for the socialist cause and security of the country.
					
					 Jean Marie Lambret, chief of the French Group for the Study of the Juche and Songun Idea, said in a report that Kim Jong Il put the strength of the country on the highest level with his Songun politics.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the events held in Sweden and France.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige el Combinado de Tractores de Kanggye
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige el Combinado de Tractores de Kanggye
Pyongyang, 10 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el Combinado de Tractores de Kanggye en que fue aplicada plena y excelentemente la tecnologia CNC al estilo Juche.
					Sobre todo, se entero detalladamente del estado de reconstruccion tecnica y de produccion recorriendo por horas varios talleres y productos de la fabrica.
					
					Evaluo altamente los orgullosos meritos de los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos de la fabrica diciendo que ellos cumplieron magnificamente el papel de vanguardia en las labores para superar lo sofisticado al aplicar la CNC en su fabrica con las fuerzas y tecnicas propias poniendo de pleno manifiesto el espiritu revolucionario de apoyarse en las propias fuerzas.
					
					La creacion del milagro en la introduccion de la CNC por parte de los obreros de la fabrica se debe a que los habitantes de la provincia de Jagang emplearon plenamente su indoblegable potencia espiritual, modo de trabajo y espiritu de Kanggye, que se vieron consolidados mil veces mediante la "Marcha penosa" y la forzada, destaco.
					
					Y elogio el entusiasmo patriotico de ellos, quienes batieron el nivel mundial de la industria de maquinaria, agradeciendo a todos los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos de la fabrica.
					
					La clase obrera de Corea logro un gran avance en establecer el sistema productivo basado en las ciencias y tecnicas modernas conforme a la demanda de la era de IT y, en particular, tomo con firmeza la heguemonia en la tecnologia CNC, senalo y califico este exito de otra gran victoria de la epoca del Songun.
					
					Todos los sectores y unidades deben impulsar con dinamismo la modernizacion basada en las ciencias y tecnicas de punta, subrayo.
					
					Continuo que si nuestra idea y nuestras fuerzas armadas mas revolucionarias se combinan con las ciencias y tecnicas sofisticadas, se registraran grandes cambios en la revolucion y la construccion y nuestra patria se convertira en la invencible potencia y verdadero paraiso del pueblo en prosperidad.
					
					Presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia en la administracion y la gestion del combinado apuntando que este ocupa un lugar importante en el desarrollo de la industria de maquinaria del pais.
					
					Esta fabrica debe seguir adelante a pasos firmes hacia la meta cientifico-tecnica mas alta basandose en los exitos logrados en la introduccion de la CNC, dijo.
					
					Indico la meta que ella debe alcanzar en un futuro cercano y senalo concretamente la direccion y los remedios para el particular.
					
					Subrayo que los funcionarios directivos de la fabrica deben operarla con la cientifica estrategia administrativa y la empresarial para hacer valer el principio de rentabilidad en la produccion.
					
					Ese dia, el Dirigente vio los extintores fabricados nuevamente en esa fabrica.
					
					El Dirigente fue acompanado en esta ocasion por Pak To Chun, secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Jagang, Kim Ki Nam, secretario del CC del PTC, y Pak Nam Gi, Kim Kyong Hui y Jang Song Thaek, jefes de departamento del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno Granja Ganadera de Kanggye
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno Granja Ganadera de Kanggye
Pyongyang, 10 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la Granja Ganadera de Kanggye, nuevamente construida en amplias florestas de la zona del monte Kubong y la de Uijin.
					Esta granja ganadera es la base combinada de gran tamano para criar animales domesticos herbivoros como cabra, conejo, pato y vaca lechera.
					
					Luego de escuchar la explicacion ante el plano de la granja, el Dirigente hizo conocimiento en detalles del estado de construccion y produccion recorriendo varios lugares incluyendo las salas de elaboracion de piensos y de leche.
					
					Senalo que la granja ganadera, dotada suficientemente de todas las instalaciones capaces de criar de modo cientifico y tecnico las cabras y otros ganados, y los equipos de elaboracion de tipo ultramoderno es la orgullosa de primera clase que esta situada en buena posicion y materializa cabalmente el principio rentable.
					
					Al ver el grandioso aspecto de la granja que hace recordar un cuadro por las granjas anexas construidas en cada floresta, las viviendas modernas, los edificios de produccion e instalaciones culturales y de servicio publico levantados en fila al pie del monte soleado, senalo que se ha extendido el paisaje singular a la orilla del luminoso rio Jangja.
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho de que la magnifica granja ganadera fue construida por las fuerzas propias de la ciudad durante un ano tan corto.
					
					Al ver varios productos de leche como mantequilla, queso y yogurt que se producen en gran cantidad en la limpia sala de elaboracion dotada de los equipos ultramodernos, dijo que es muy alta su calidad y se mostro muy alegre de la posibilidad de suministrar la mayor cantidad de los alimentos subsidiarios sabrosos y nutritivos a los ciudadanos de Kanggye.
					
					Destaco que esta granja ganadera se encarga de la porcion importante en el mejoramiento de condiciones de la vida alimentaria de los ciudadanos de Kanggye y presento las tareas programaticas para administrarla.
					
					Enseno que lo mas importante en aumentar los productos ganaderos es resolver bien el problema de reproductores y asevero que para este fin es preciso prestar primordial atencion a la materializacion de la orientacion del partido para el mejoramiento de reproductores.
					
					Indico que la granja resolvio el problema de piensos basandose en las materias primas locales nutritivas y clorela e incremento bruscamente la tasa de aumento del peso de los ganados introduciendo las nuevas tecnicas avanzadas en los procesos productivos en su conjunto, lo cual es valiosa experiencia a ser aprendida. 
					
					Subrayo la necesidad de aplicar estrictamente la cientifizacion y la intensificacion en la cria y cuidado de los ganados.
					
					Destaco que los funcionarios deben pensar sin cesar y luchar persistentemente con el espiritu de servicio de abnegacion al pueblo.
					
					Le acompanaron el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Jagang Pak To Chun, el secretario del CC del PTC Kim Ki Nam y los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC Pak Nam Gi, Kim Kyong Hui y Jang Song Thaek.

articles.title: Regresan Stephen Bosworth y su comitiva
articles.content:
Regresan Stephen Bosworth y su comitiva
Pyongyang, 10 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Partieron el dia 10 de esta capital por via aerea Stephen Bosworth, representante especial de Estados Unidos para la politica sobre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, y su comitiva.

articles.title: En Pyongyang delegacion de EE.UU.
articles.content:
En Pyongyang delegacion de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 10 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Llego el dia 10 a esta capital por via aerea la delegacion del consorcio encargado de la ciencia Estados Unidos-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea encabezada por Peter Agre, presidente de la Asociacion Norteamericana para el Avance de la Ciencia.

articles.title: Cuadros de Estado ven funcion artistica del MINSEP
articles.content:
Cuadros de Estado ven funcion artistica del MINSEP
Pyongyang, 10 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El grupo de propaganda artistica del Ministerio de Seguridad del Pueblo ofrecio el dia 10 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo la funcion para los cuadros del Estado, presidentes de partidos amigos, funcionarios de ministerios y organos centrales y trabajadores capitalinos.
					En la escena se pusieron el coro mixto "Quisimos mucho ver al General", la cancion con acompanamiento de Oungum "Al Lucero General, mas alla de las nubes", la trompeta y solo femenino "Al lado del General viven los soldados", la poesia a coro "Largo camino de la defensa a costa de la vida" y el coro pequeno "Prospera, epoca del Partido del Trabajo" y otras variadas piezas.
					
					Los actores elogiaron ardientemente las hazanas de la direccion del General Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun, quien abre con la marcha ultraforzada brecha de victoria en la delantera del nuevo y gran auge revolucionario y cantaron en tono patetico los orgullosos meritos realizados por el ejercito interior en la linea avanzada de la lucha clasista y la lucha por defender a la patria socialista y la seguridad del pueblo.
